discussion.title: How to make iterative search?
discussion.body:
Hello,
I need a model to search for equations on dataset1, then change parameters of this model and and search again but on (a different)
dataset2.And repeat this.
But seems it doesn't change data, because when it starts fitting second dataset, it gives me the same losses.
Will it work like that? or I need two models and fit equations from one model to another? 

https://gist.github.com/DenisSvirin/f3ba66627234908a0edebfd9c78a51d7

nodes.body:
Coincidentally just yesterday I pushed a fix for this exact use case: https://github.com/MilesCranmer/SymbolicRegression.jl/pull/177

Next PySR update will have it, or before then you could change `version.py` to the latest SymbolicRegression.jl version and run `python setup.py install` and then `pysr.install()`.
